Javascripts Closures

Closures are on of the most difficult Javsscirpt concepts to to understand.Simply put a closure is a retained scoped.The following examples and explanations will make the concept clearer.

Syntax


  selector {
   proptery1:value1;
   propery2:value2;
  }
  
  
  //

CSS can be insterted directy into and HTML element (inline css).Instered at the beginning of the HTML document (Internal CSS) or placed in an external file and
Imported into the docuemnt.External CSS.

Color and Background 

 
  
  //set the foreground color;
  h1{

  color:#FF0000;

  }
  
  
  //set the background property of an element  
  h2{
  
   background-color:#FC9804;
   
  }

  // set an  image
  body{
  
   background-image: url("butterfly.gif");
   background-repeat:repeat-x;    //other values repeat-y repeat and no-repeat;
  }
  
  fix the background image
  
   body{
   
    background-image: url("butterfly.gif");
	background-attachment:fixed; // also scroll
   }
  
   control where the background image apperas
   background-position: top-right;

Fonts 

 

   //Font Family
    h1{
	  
	  font-family: Arial sans-serif
	
	}

	
	//Shorthand font property
	
	font-stlye|font-variant|font-weight|font-size|font-family
